bug.author: ElliottYan
bug.summary: About Noisy channel reranking, empty file error
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
Hi, I'm trying to reproduce the result of noisy channel reranking using my mac (without cuda environment). But some empty file error happens. I follow the exact instructions stated here. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/fairseq/tree/be86e7ebefb21f694b190487b789f4e61132fc13/examples/noisychannel>https://github.com/pytorch/fairseq/tree/be86e7ebefb21f694b190487b789f4e61132fc13/examples/noisychannel</denchmark-link>
The following error happens. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10862038/81393556-25c1ea80-9153-11ea-8f3b-64a2d99b2c1c.png></denchmark-link>
I have no idea what's going on. Could somebody help me here? Thx <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
fairseq Version (e.g., 1.0 or master): 0.9.0 PyTorch Version (e.g., 1.0) 1.5.0 OS (e.g., Linux): MacOSX How you installed fairseq (pip, source): sourcec Build command you used (if compiling from source): pip install --editable . Python version: 3.7 CUDA/cuDNN version: GPU models and configuration: Any other relevant information:
